titles: A sermon preached to the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, and Court of Aldermen of the city of London, at their anniversary meeting on Easter Monday April 1652, at the Spittle wherein the unity of the saints with Christ, the head, and especially with the church, the body, with the duties thence arising, are endeavoured to be cleared : tending to heale our rents and divisions / by Stephen Marshal ...
author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.
publisher: Printed by R.I. for Stephen Bowtel ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
